title: How To Rock Your New Year's Eve Party
teaser: Throwing a New Year’s Eve party can be a lot of work, but it doesn’t have to be overwhelming – especially the food. John Munson’s guest cooking expert has some tips on how to throw a holiday bash and still have fun . Plus, she shares some easy and tasty recipes for hors d’oeuvres, main dishes, desserts and beverages, and welcomes your suggestions.
